Task_Area2Cooking.name: Dognip
Task_Area2Cooking.description: The favorite food of trained hounds.

Item_Cooking_0901.name: Awful stew
Item_Cooking_0901.description: A bunch of unknown ingredients roughly stewed in a big pot, with a bulk of nutrients lost in the process.

Item_Cooking_0902.name: Fine stew
Item_Cooking_0902.description: It looks like a success, but the choice of ingredients ultimately contributes to the dish's downfall...

Item_Cooking_1001.name: Fried mushrooms
Item_Cooking_1001.description: Taste aside, at least it's cooked and not raw.

Item_Cooking_1002.name: Seaweed and egg soup
Item_Cooking_1002.description: Got fresh laver and rich in protein, good for filling up the tummy.

Item_Cooking_1003.name: Crispy grilled fish
Item_Cooking_1003.description: One of the popular eats in the port city of Banges. Cheap and delicious.

Item_Cooking_1004.name: Wholegrain bread
Item_Cooking_1004.description: Made from processed grain, nutritious and easily kept. Every Wanderer should carry some.

Item_Cooking_1005.name: Breakfast cereal
Item_Cooking_1005.description: Once a life-saving ration enough to feed five to six people. Given the improved condition, people add milk to it now instead of water.

Item_Cooking_1006.name: Sizzling meat
Item_Cooking_1006.description: How would you like it cooked? Real men just eat it after a few seconds of grilling on rocks under a hot sun.

Item_Cooking_1007.name: Seafood soup
Item_Cooking_1007.description: They said one bite will pep you up, two will make you healthy, despite the average taste.

Item_Cooking_1008.name: Crispy chicken burger
Item_Cooking_1008.description: Chicken burgers seen in fast food joints. Few things top the combo of hot, crunchy chicken and crispy lettuce.

Item_Cooking_1009.name: Spicy burger
Item_Cooking_1009.description: No matter how long it's been, it never fails to stir your appetite.

Item_Cooking_1010.name: Egg fried rice
Item_Cooking_1010.description: This is the twist you need when you get tired of eating plain white rice.

Item_Cooking_1011.name: Steamed crab
Item_Cooking_1011.description: Seafood is best when served fresh. The problem is, where to start?

Item_Cooking_1012.name: Iced strawberry soda
Item_Cooking_1012.description: Mix pureed strawberries into soda, then add ice. A summer essential.

Item_Cooking_1014.name: Thundercloud blueberry soda
Item_Cooking_1014.description: The blueberry is as dark as a rain cloud. Be careful not to spill it on you, since it's hard to wash off.

Item_Cooking_1015.name: Golden egg and tomato
Item_Cooking_1015.description: No, I didn't scramble the eggs by accident...

Item_Cooking_1016.name: Simple power salad
Item_Cooking_1016.description: The most basic salad for meeting the daily nutrient requirement. The choice for a low-fat diet.

Item_Cooking_1017.name: Lettuce salad
Item_Cooking_1017.description: A nice salad with simple ingredients and a robust flavor.

Item_Cooking_1018.name: Mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_1018.description: A perfect combination of fresh mushrooms and crispy lettuce.

Item_Cooking_1019.name: Fried egg
Item_Cooking_1019.description: Start a wonderful day off with fried eggs!

Item_Cooking_1020.name: Steamed conch
Item_Cooking_1020.description: It retains all of its original taste! A sprinkle of chopped green onion would improve it, though.

Item_Cooking_1021.name: Steamed egg with sea urchin
Item_Cooking_1021.description: Sea urchin with smooth steamed egg is delicious and comforting, particularly popular in the snowfield.

Item_Cooking_1022.name: Double Berry Jam Toast
Item_Cooking_1022.description: Fusion of two berries for a sweet-sour symphony in your mouth.

Item_Cooking_1023.name: Tomato and fried egg pasta
Item_Cooking_1023.description: Perfectly sour and easy to make. A tasty low-calorie treat.

Item_Cooking_1024.name: Meat and potato stew
Item_Cooking_1024.description: The meat absorbed all the nutrients, so it's extremely healthy!

Item_Cooking_1025.name: Fries
Item_Cooking_1025.description: It's not junk food but pure happiness!

Item_Cooking_1027.name: Fried chicken
Item_Cooking_1027.description: Simple and quick meal. The crispy golden coating will make passersby drool.

Item_Cooking_1028.name: Honeyed fruit juice
Item_Cooking_1028.description: Fresh juice with dabs of honey, slightly shaken. A tinge of sweetness amid the sour.

Item_Cooking_1029.name: Fruit cake
Item_Cooking_1029.description: There's no stress a piece of delicious cake can't solve. If there is, have a second!

Item_Cooking_1030.name: Iced orchid surprise
Item_Cooking_1030.description: Summer special. Feel the surf party in your mouth!

Item_Cooking_1031.name: Stir-fried broccoli
Item_Cooking_1031.description: Healthy low-fat food, though not a favorite for most.

Item_Cooking_1032.name: Boiled scallops
Item_Cooking_1032.description: A simple tasty dish without any seasoning needed.

Item_Cooking_1033.name: Meat bun
Item_Cooking_1033.description: The juice that bursts out when you bite into one is the essence!

Item_Cooking_1034.name: Sliced fish with mushroom
Item_Cooking_1034.description: A perfect complement of sliced fish and mushroom.

Item_Cooking_1035.name: Roast rump
Item_Cooking_1035.description: Set up the grill and grab a chair. Yeah, that's the smell...

Item_Cooking_1036.name: Dandelion mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_1036.description: Ever tried dandelion with mushroom? It will make you light on your feet.

Item_Cooking_2001.name: Surf and Turf
Item_Cooking_2001.description: Banges' home cooking for that hometown taste.

Item_Cooking_2002.name: Red wheat bread
Item_Cooking_2002.description: Most common food among the people of Aida that reflects their simple life.

Item_Cooking_2003.name: Fiddlehead pie
Item_Cooking_2003.description: Healthy biscuit with fiddlehead filling, not too popular among kids, though.

Item_Cooking_2004.name: Chocolate bread
Item_Cooking_2004.description: Stuffed with chocolate! Just hold off your diet for a day.

Item_Cooking_2005.name: Firecap mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_2005.description: What's more comforting than a piping hot firecap mushroom soup when you're scaling snowy peaks?

Item_Cooking_2006.name: Black moss soup
Item_Cooking_2006.description: Fill up the stomach now and grab something better later.

Item_Cooking_2007.name: Balloon fruit salad
Item_Cooking_2007.description: Specially selected salad. Sweet and sour, kids' favorite!

Item_Cooking_2009.name: Spicy eel
Item_Cooking_2009.description: Is the electric eel fully cooked? How come my tongue feels tingly?

Item_Cooking_2010.name: Eel and mushroom soup
Item_Cooking_2010.description: A spicy challenge for the taste buds. Down it in one gulp if you dare! And no water allowed!

Item_Cooking_2011.name: Sea crab soup
Item_Cooking_2011.description: All good things of a crab are in the stew.

Item_Cooking_2012.name: Sweet pomegranate juice
Item_Cooking_2012.description: Am I seeing things, or is the juice actually glowing?

Item_Cooking_2013.name: Cocoa milk
Item_Cooking_2013.description: Drink a cup before bedtime and have a sweet dream!

Item_Cooking_2014.name: Firedragon fruit tea
Item_Cooking_2014.description: Couple this with a cake for a perfect afternoon tea!

Item_Cooking_2015.name: Barnacle stew
Item_Cooking_2015.description: A taste that you will enjoy!

Item_Cooking_2017.name: Snow azalea tea
Item_Cooking_2017.description: Why don't you have some while vegging by the campfire in cold winter?

Item_Cooking_2018.name: Pine cocoa
Item_Cooking_2018.description: Nut-flavored cocoa milk. Nut lovers can add more nuts to it.

Item_Cooking_2019.name: Nut tea
Item_Cooking_2019.description: Smell how fresh the nuts are...

Item_Cooking_2020.name: Purple yam pie
Item_Cooking_2020.description: Filling pie and portable enough for long hikes.

Item_Cooking_2021.name: Snow lotus soup
Item_Cooking_2021.description: Snow lotus tastes rather bland, so sugar is added to make it a popular dessert.

Item_Cooking_2022.name: Truffle fried rice
Item_Cooking_2022.description: Stir-fry the truffle, then mix it with fried rice.

Item_Cooking_2023.name: Caterpillar fungus noodles
Item_Cooking_2023.description: Am I at the age when I have to watch my diet?

Item_Cooking_2024.name: Caviar sushi
Item_Cooking_2024.description: A visually pleasant roll makes it a classy dish. If you can't make it, you're better off mixing them in a bowl.

Item_Cooking_2025.name: Caviar potato balls
Item_Cooking_2025.description: Soft potato balls drenched in premium caviar. You'll want seconds.

Item_Cooking_2027.name: Steak with mushroom sauce
Item_Cooking_2027.description: I think I'm seeing steaks flying across the sky...

Item_Cooking_2029.name: Juicy meat sandwich
Item_Cooking_2029.description: Take your time and make yourself a good breakfast!

Item_Cooking_2030.name: Salmon sashimi
Item_Cooking_2030.description: This is what food should taste like!

Item_Cooking_2031.name: Snail baked rice
Item_Cooking_2031.description: Looks like a weird fusion, but much tastier than it looks.

item_Cooking_3002.name: Charcoal Grilled Sand Onion
item_Cooking_3002.description: Wanderer's mouth-watering BBQ Stand, now open!

item_Cooking_3003.name: Aloe Yogurt
item_Cooking_3003.description: Who doesn't like sweet and sour yogurt?

item_Cooking_3004.name: Rose Tea
item_Cooking_3004.description: When brewing rose tea, even the most restless mind will calm down miraculously.

item_Cooking_3005.name: Thornfruit Soda
item_Cooking_3005.description: A generous amount of honey is added to give a taste to this plain thornfruit juice.

item_Cooking_3006.name: Beet Soup
item_Cooking_3006.description: Warm beetroot soup. You can easily drink up a whole pot in cold weather.

item_Cooking_3007.name: Sweetmelon Salad
item_Cooking_3007.description: It tastes better when it's chilled, but don't be greedy.

item_Cooking_3008.name: Thornfruit Soda
item_Cooking_3008.description: A generous amount of honey is added to give a taste to this plain thornfruit juice.

item_Cooking_3009.name: Pumpkin Porridge
item_Cooking_3009.description: Quite a staple food that can be filling, and you probably won't need to eat anything else after a bowl.

item_Cooking_3010.name: Fried Tofu
item_Cooking_3010.description: Crispy, golden fried snacks. Be careful not to drip the sauce on your clothes!

item_Cooking_3011.name: Radish Soup
item_Cooking_3011.description: Nourishing and delicious soup. Another bowl please!

item_Cooking_3012.name: Salt-and-Pepper Corn
item_Cooking_3012.description: Simple and easy snacks, the first choice for late nights.

item_Cooking_3013.name: Cactus Special
item_Cooking_3013.description: Refreshing Cactus Special, essential for summer.

item_Cooking_3014.name: Grilled Lizard Tail
item_Cooking_3014.description: Sprinkle it with chilis, cumin, and pepper, and wait quietly for a while before you start.

item_Cooking_3015.name: Special Grilled Rib
item_Cooking_3015.description: The best companion with rice! The one and only!

item_Cooking_3016.name: Chocolate Soy Milk
item_Cooking_3016.description: If you are tired of drinking ordinary soy milk, why not try this one?

item_Cooking_3017.name: Beet with Fiddlehead
item_Cooking_3017.description: Once the ingredients are boiled, remove them from the pan, add the sauce, mix well and you're good to go.

item_Cooking_3018.name: Desert Salad
item_Cooking_3018.description: Diced ball cactus and thornfruits with some salad dressing. Recommended to chill it first.

item_Cooking_3019.name: Rose Bread
item_Cooking_3019.description: A pleasant afternoon starts with a rose-scented square bread.

item_Cooking_3020.name: Honeymelon Bread
item_Cooking_3020.description: Just one round bread stuffed with sweet melon filling is enough for breakfast.

item_Cooking_3021.name: Multigrain Porridge
item_Cooking_3021.description: The rice porridge is made of a variety of mixed grains. Sometimes, I just want to eat something mild.

item_Cooking_3022.name: Corn and Seafood Biscuit
item_Cooking_3022.description: All-seafood tacos... You'll go broke opening a store like this!

item_Cooking_3023.name: Steamed Pumpkin
item_Cooking_3023.description: The steamed pumpkin is soft and sweet. It's a good choice for weight loss meals.

item_Cooking_3024.name: Chicken Soup
item_Cooking_3024.description: Smooth noodles topped with warm chicken broth. Just pretend this is a bowl of birthday noodles and come make a wish.

item_Cooking_3025.name: Spicy BBQ Noodles
item_Cooking_3025.description: I can certainly rival Kun Ji Noodles!

item_Cooking_3027.name: Grilled Combo Plate
item_Cooking_3027.description: This must be the meat lover's paradise, right!?

item_Cooking_3028.name: Radish and Pork Chop Soup
item_Cooking_3028.description: Radish and pork chop soup, which has been carefully stewed for a whole day. The radishes are actually more delicious than the spareribs.

item_Cooking_3029.name: Creamy Corn Soup
item_Cooking_3029.description: A creamy, sweet, and tangy soup, isn't this the time to eat it with bread?

item_Cooking_3030.name: Crispy Lard Gourd
item_Cooking_3030.description: Wrap it in the frying powder and deep fry for two minutes, and you're done!

item_Cooking_3031.name: Grilled Oyster
item_Cooking_3031.description: It's hard to decide whether to eat it raw with some lemon juice or grill it.

item_Cooking_3032.name: Cold Fish Mint
item_Cooking_3032.description: After the first try, I've fallen in love with the taste of fish mint!

item_Cooking_3033.name: Spicy Lard Gourd Strip
item_Cooking_3033.description: The appetizing cold dish seems to be fine as a main meal also.

item_Cooking_3034.name: Oyster Tofu Soup
item_Cooking_3034.description: I heard that many children don't like to eat fish, so this soup is specially made.

item_Cooking_3035.name: Scramble Egg with Fish Mint
item_Cooking_3035.description: Everything can be scrambled with eggs! My favorite is...

item_activity_cooking_001.name: Roast Suckling Pig
item_activity_cooking_001.description:
A roast suckling pig cooked by an excellent chef can satisfy the most discerning of diners.

After defeating Apophis and Rose Queen, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_002.name: Braised Turkey with Apples
item_activity_cooking_002.description:
An Astra specialty. Thanks to the promotions of vendors and travelers, it has become popular across the entire continent.

After defeating Apophis and Rose Queen, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_003.name: Roasted Drumstick with Veggies
item_activity_cooking_003.description:
First satisfy your taste buds with a bite of the roasted chicken drumstick. Then have a mouthful of refreshing lettuce. Yum yum!

After defeating Apophis and Rose Queen, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_004.name: Pan-fried Salmon
item_activity_cooking_004.description:
Tender salmon is served with sweet honey, leaving a pleasant aftertaste in your mouth.

After defeating Robarg and Sobek, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_005.name: Small Sesame Rice Dumplings
item_activity_cooking_005.description:
A traditional Banges Port specialty that is greatly loved by young and old.

After defeating Robarg and Sobek, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_006.name: Turkey Beetroot Soup
item_activity_cooking_006.description:
A bowl of warm soup that can chase away all the fatigue of the day.
After defeating Robarg and Sobek, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_007.name: Gingerbread
item_activity_cooking_007.description:
A popular festival dessert that has the sweetness of sugar and honey and the pleasant fragrance of wheat grains.

After defeating Robarg, Apophis, Frost Bot, Sobek, Rose Queen and Barbarossa, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_008.name: Apple Cake
item_activity_cooking_008.description:
A fluffy fruit cake. One bite, and you'll be satisfied. 

After defeating Frost Bot and Barbarossa, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_009.name: Fruit Punch
item_activity_cooking_009.description:
A drink with a fruitful aroma and the slightest smell of booze.

After defeating Frost Bot and Barbarossa, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity_cooking_010.name: Apple Juice
item_activity_cooking_010.description:
Sweet and sour. Suitable for both young and old. A favorite summer drink for many people.

After defeating Frost Bot and Barbarossa, drops from password chest during the Aida Cafe event. Alternatively obtained by collecting ingredients and cooking.

item_activity2_cooking_101.name: Floating Crush
item_activity2_cooking_101.description: Ride in the balloon fruit, to the world of chocolate!

item_activity2_cooking_102.name: Pine Nut Crush
item_activity2_cooking_102.description: Chocolate covered with pine nuts is the perfect gift.

item_activity2_cooking_103.name: Strawberry Crush
item_activity2_cooking_103.description: The blend of lightly sweet strawberries and mellow chocolate is the sweet taste of first love.

item_activity2_cooking_104.name: Hazelnut Crush
item_activity2_cooking_104.description: Wrapped in chocolate is a heart of anticipation for love.

item_activity2_cooking_105.name: Truffle Crush
item_activity2_cooking_105.description: You can feel the affection from the selection of ingredients.

item_activity2_cooking_106.name: Blueberry Crush
item_activity2_cooking_106.description: Take a bite, and let the sweet and sour blueberry jam flow on the tip of your tongue.

item_activity2_cooking_107.name: Honey Crush
item_activity2_cooking_107.description: A majestic symphony of chocolate and honey.

item_activity2_cooking_108.name: Fallen Fruit Crush
item_activity2_cooking_108.description: To give you the thing I hold most dear.

item_activity2_cooking_109.name: Cocoa Crush
item_activity2_cooking_109.description: Delicate and soft dark chocolate, crocheted with a slightly bitter and mellow dream.

item_activity2_cooking_110.name: Milk Crush
item_activity2_cooking_110.description: Milk and chocolate are a match made in heaven!

item_activity2_cooking_201.name: Floating Planet
item_activity2_cooking_201.description: Ride in the balloon fruit, to the world of chocolate!

item_activity2_cooking_202.name: Pine Nut Planet
item_activity2_cooking_202.description: Chocolate covered with pine nuts is the perfect gift.

item_activity2_cooking_203.name: Strawberry Planet
item_activity2_cooking_203.description: The blend of lightly sweet strawberries and mellow chocolate is the sweet taste of first love.

item_activity2_cooking_204.name: Hazelnut Planet
item_activity2_cooking_204.description: Wrapped in chocolate is a heart of anticipation for love.

item_activity2_cooking_205.description: You can feel the affection from the selection of ingredients.

item_activity2_cooking_206.name: Blueberry Planet
item_activity2_cooking_206.description: Take a bite, and let the sweet and sour blueberry jam flow on the tip of your tongue.

item_activity2_cooking_207.name: Honey Planet
item_activity2_cooking_207.description: A majestic symphony of chocolate and honey.

item_activity2_cooking_208.name: Fallen Fruit Planet
item_activity2_cooking_208.description: To give you the thing I hold most dear.

item_activity2_cooking_209.description: Delicate and soft dark chocolate, crocheted with a slightly bitter and mellow dream.

item_activity2_cooking_210.name: Milk Planet
item_activity2_cooking_210.description: Milk and chocolate are a match made in heaven!

item_activity2_cooking_301.name: Floating Cube
item_activity2_cooking_301.description: Ride in the balloon fruit, to the world of chocolate!

item_activity2_cooking_302.name: Pine Nut Cube
item_activity2_cooking_302.description: Chocolate covered with pine nuts is the perfect gift.

item_activity2_cooking_303.name: Strawberry Cube
item_activity2_cooking_303.description: The blend of lightly sweet strawberries and mellow chocolate is the sweet taste of first love.

item_activity2_cooking_304.name: Hazelnut Cube
item_activity2_cooking_304.description: Wrapped in chocolate is a heart of anticipation for love.

item_activity2_cooking_305.name: Truffle Cube
item_activity2_cooking_305.description: You can feel the affection from the selection of ingredients.

item_activity2_cooking_306.name: Blueberry Cube
item_activity2_cooking_306.description: Take a bite, and let the sweet and sour blueberry jam flow on the tip of your tongue.

item_activity2_cooking_307.name: Honey Cube
item_activity2_cooking_307.description: A majestic symphony of chocolate and honey.

item_activity2_cooking_308.name: Fallen Fruit Cube
item_activity2_cooking_308.description: To give you the thing I hold most dear.

item_activity2_cooking_309.description: Delicate and soft dark chocolate, crocheted with a slightly bitter and mellow dream.

item_activity2_cooking_310.name: Milk Cube
item_activity2_cooking_310.description: Milk and chocolate are a match made in heaven!

item_activity2_cooking_001.name: Cetus Souvenir
item_activity2_cooking_001.description:
Electromancy themed chocolate giftbox, Hanna's proud work.
The Doctor says that delicious things must be shared with important people!

item_activity2_cooking_002.name: Cetus Souvenir
item_activity2_cooking_002.description:
Physical element themed chocolate giftbox, Hanna's proud work.
The Doctor says that delicious things must be shared with important people!

item_activity2_cooking_003.name: Cetus Souvenir
item_activity2_cooking_003.description:
Pyromancy themed chocolate giftbox, Hanna's proud work.
The Doctor says that delicious things must be shared with important people!

item_activity2_cooking_004.name: Cetus Souvenir
item_activity2_cooking_004.description:
Cryomancy themed chocolate giftbox, Hanna's proud work.
The Doctor says that delicious things must be shared with important people!

item_activity2_cooking_005.name: Crispy Rice Cake
item_activity2_cooking_005.description: One of Planet Aida's most popular snacks. Members of the Hyenas and the Ravagers are said to have fought over one piece of the cake.

HealPotion_01.name: Spring Pancake
HealPotion_01.description:
The most popular snack at the Spring Market.
It's impossible to tell its flavor from the look of it...

BuffPotion_01.name: Pinebreeze
BuffPotion_01.description:
Beverage featured in the Spring Market,
One sip of the drink is said to make you feel like being in the middle of a pine forest, with the spring breeze gently blowing on your cheeks.

item_activity3_cooking_101.name: Classic Lotus Seed Paste Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_101.description: Lotus seed paste is always the most classic flavor!

item_activity3_cooking_102.name: Classic Five Nuts Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_102.description: It contains five types of nuts and is known as the Five Nuts Mooncake.

item_activity3_cooking_103.name: Handmade Hazelnut Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_103.description: Silky smooth in the mouth is mixed with the aroma of hazelnuts that gives its sweet skin a unique flavor.

item_activity3_cooking_104.name: Firedragon Fruit Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_104.description: Don't count the seeds in the filling when you're having mooncakes!

item_activity3_cooking_105.name: Chocolate Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_105.description: The kids love it best, and so do the adults.

item_activity3_cooking_106.name: Spicy Pork Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_106.description: Huge chunks of tender and lean meat bring an explosion of flavor in your mouth.

item_activity3_cooking_107.name: Spicy Floss Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_107.description: A delicacy that makes it impossible to stop eating!

item_activity3_cooking_108.name: Handmade Mushroom Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_108.description: Almost no one thought it wasn't a weird combination before they had a taste of it...

item_activity3_cooking_109.name: Salted Egg Yolk Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_109.description: A moist egg yolk with a rich salty aroma.

item_activity3_cooking_110.name: Classic Crab Roe Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_110.description: The rich sauce within it sets the tone for this mooncake.

item_activity3_cooking_201.name: Pork Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_201.description: You'll eat up the juicy and delicious meat before you even realize it...

item_activity3_cooking_202.name: Ham Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_202.description: The savory ham and the crispy pastry with a tinge of sweetness form an aromatic fusion.

item_activity3_cooking_203.name: Floral Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_203.description: Every bite of this soft and fragrant meat mooncake comes with a floral fragrance that fills the mouth.

item_activity3_cooking_204.name: Strawberry Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_204.description: It's a little sweeter than conventional mooncakes, so a little tea is required to fully enjoy its flavor.

item_activity3_cooking_205.name: Chocolate Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_205.description: The soft and crispy puff pastry shell neutralizes the chocolate's sweetness, so having a few more won't be a problem at all!

item_activity3_cooking_206.name: Spicy Rib Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_206.description: People with bad teeth may have to reconsider their decision to have this mooncake.

item_activity3_cooking_207.name: Spicy Floss Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_207.description: The mix of soft filling and crispy skin makes for a completely different texture in the mouth.

item_activity3_cooking_208.name: Scallop Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_208.description: Tired of having it boiled? Try it inside a mooncake instead!

item_activity3_cooking_209.name: Black Truffle Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_209.description: Carefully savor the earthy flavors of this rare and expensive delicacy.

item_activity3_cooking_210.name: Crab Roe Pastry Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_210.description: Heat it up a little to fully enjoy the creamy goodness within.

item_activity3_cooking_301.name: Ice Cream Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_301.description: The classic combination of ice cream and snow skin.

item_activity3_cooking_302.name: Bean Paste Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_302.description: Experience a new burst of flavors after it's frozen.

item_activity3_cooking_303.name: Fallen Fruit Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_303.description: The most classic type of fruity mooncakes.

item_activity3_cooking_304.name: Blueberry Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_304.description: Taste the silky texture of the filling and the granularity of the fruit in the same bite.

item_activity3_cooking_305.name: Chocolate Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_305.description: Nothing beats it, at least when it comes to aesthetics.

item_activity3_cooking_306.name: Spicy Sturgeon Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_306.description: Hot! Tender! A must eat for those who love spicy food!

item_activity3_cooking_307.name: Spicy Pine Nut Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_307.description: A perfect blend of spiciness and nuttiness.

item_activity3_cooking_308.name: Spicy Floss Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_308.description: An icy cold shell with a fiery hot filling.

item_activity3_cooking_309.name: Caviar Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_309.description: Just the ingredients alone show how expensive it is!

item_activity3_cooking_310.name: Crab Roe Snowskin Mooncake
item_activity3_cooking_310.description: This mooncake is definitely ranked in the top three of "strange-looking but must-try" mooncakes.

item_BurgerKing_Whopper.name: Whopper
item_BurgerKing_Whopper.description: A popular product made with a carefully grilled beef patty, crunchy and fresh lettuce, juicy tomato slices and refreshing pickles.
